summary: A story about the most popular racing event in the galaxy, the Redline, and the various racers who compete in it.
cast: Takuya Kimura|Yû Aoi|Tadanobu Asano|Yoshiyuki Morishita|Kanji Tsuda|Ken'yû Horiuchi|Akemi|Takeshi Aono|Tatsuya Gashûin|Kôji Ishii|Unshô Ishizuka|Kenta Miyake|Chô|Yoshinori Okada|Patrick Seitz|Michelle Ruff|Liam O'Brien|Doug Erholtz|JB Blanc|Christine Marie Cabanos|Michael Forest|Cutter Garcia|Erika Harlacher|Kyle Hebert|Steve Kramer|Lauren Landa|Raymond D. Lavallee|Wendee Lee|David Lodge|Dave Mallow|Michael McConnohie|Joey Morris|Tony Oliver|Laura Post|Jamieson Price|Derek Stephen Prince|Sam Riegel|Keith Silverstein|Victor Sgroi|Christopher Corey Smith|Paul St. Peter|Mark Allen Jr.|Joe Thomas|Amanda Céline Miller|Jason Wishnov
title: Redline
